forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 68. East wind around 7 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely and a slight chance of thunderstorms after 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. East northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Light Rain Likely then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8am, then rain showers likely between 8am and 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 64. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. Northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
